ModMetaData.name: Better Traders Guild
ModMetaData.author: Sam Hunt
ModMetaData.description:
[ALPHA] Expands interactions with the Traders Guild faction in RimWorld 1.6.
Current Features (Alpha): - Visit Traders Guild orbital bases peacefully for trading (requires good relations) - Dynamic orbital trader rotation system - different trader types dock every few days - Configurable trader rotation interval (5-30 days) - "Docked Vessel" display shows current trader on world map - Custom settlement layouts with 18 room types (in progress)
Planned Features: - Enhanced reputation systems and trade quotas - Additional goodwill quests
Requires the Odyssey DLC. Save-game safe (one-time red error log on removal).
